entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Candiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
